description: This file defines a logger wrapper function that creates and returns a Log object from the ExternalLog module, adding some path configuration.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Function to instantiate and return a Log object from Imported ExternalLog module with specified parameters.

ctags.name: Create
